meanings.definition: Soaked in or preserved with a solution of salt and water.
meanings.sent1: The brined olives had a salty taste.
meanings.sent2: The chef used brined cucumbers in the salad.
meanings.sent3: The brined fish made the cat curious.
meanings.sent4: The brined meat was a flavor explosion in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The brined vegetables were a hit at the party.

meanings.definition: To soak in or preserve with a solution of salt and water.
meanings.sent1: She brined the chicken before grilling it.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for brining the pork overnight.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally brined his socks in the salty water.
meanings.sent4: The chef brined the turkey to enhance its flavor.
meanings.sent5: Brining the vegetables made them crunchy and delicious.
